issues.description: No data import wizard in onboarding flow - users can't migrate existing business data, forcing manual re-entry
issues.rationale: Small business owners have existing data in spreadsheets/tools that needs migration

issues.description: Dashboard lacks role-based widget customization - owners vs employees see same view, creating info overload
issues.rationale: Different users need different primary metrics and actions visible

issues.description: No offline mode consideration for mobile app - loses all functionality without connection
issues.rationale: Small business owners work in areas with poor connectivity

issues.description: Skip logic allows bypassing payment setup - creates broken state where features fail silently
issues.rationale: Core business functions require payment processing to be configured

issues.description: Navigation grouping hides critical daily tasks under vague categories like 'Tools' or 'More'
issues.rationale: Users can't find invoice creation or inventory management quickly

issues.description: No quick-action command palette or search - forces users through multiple menu levels for common tasks
issues.rationale: Power users need keyboard shortcuts and instant action access

issues.description: Progress indicator doesn't show time estimates - users abandon not knowing if it's 2 or 20 minutes
issues.rationale: Time-pressed owners need to know commitment required upfront

issues.description: Activation path doesn't validate business requirements - allows incomplete setup causing feature failures
issues.rationale: Missing tax ID or business type breaks compliance features

issues.description: Touch targets increased uniformly without considering context - wastes screen real estate on tablets
issues.rationale: Adaptive sizing needed based on device type and screen size

issues.description: No breadcrumb trail or back navigation consistency - users get lost in nested screens
issues.rationale: Complex workflows need clear wayfinding and escape routes

suggestedFixes.fix: Add CSV/Excel import wizard with field mapping and validation in step 2 of onboarding
suggestedFixes.rationale: Reduces setup time from hours to minutes by auto-importing existing data

suggestedFixes.fix: Create 3 preset dashboards: Owner (finances), Manager (operations), Employee (tasks)
suggestedFixes.rationale: Each role sees only relevant widgets and actions on first login

suggestedFixes.fix: Cache last 7 days of data locally, queue actions for sync when reconnected
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains core functionality during connectivity issues

suggestedFixes.fix: Mark payment, tax info, and business type as mandatory with clear blocking messages
suggestedFixes.rationale: Prevents broken states by enforcing critical setup requirements
Aligns navigation with actual business workflows and mental models

suggestedFixes.fix: Add CMD+K searchable action launcher with recent/frequent actions at top
suggestedFixes.rationale: Power users can trigger any action in 2 keystrokes instead of 5 clicks

suggestedFixes.fix: Show '3 min remaining' under progress bar, update dynamically based on completion speed
suggestedFixes.rationale: Sets clear expectations so users commit to finishing setup

suggestedFixes.fix: Add real-time validation for business info with API checks for tax ID format
suggestedFixes.rationale: Catches errors during entry instead of failing later in workflow

suggestedFixes.fix: Use 44px targets on phones, 32px on tablets, with responsive grid system
suggestedFixes.rationale: Optimizes touch accuracy while maximizing content density per device

suggestedFixes.fix: Add persistent breadcrumb bar showing Home > Section > Current Page with back button
suggestedFixes.rationale: Users always know location and have consistent escape path
